:v-model.description: You can control the pop-up and collapse of a v-model variable with a boolean value, and the value of the v-model is bound in both directions
:v-model.description_zh: 通过v-model绑定一个值为布尔值的变量控制组件的弹出与收起，v-model的值是双向绑定的

:list.description: The text array of the button is shown in the document above for an example
:list.description_zh: 按钮的文字数组，见上方文档示例

tips.description: For the prompt text at the top, see the example above
tips.description_zh: 顶部的提示文字，见上方文档示例

cancel-btn.description: Whether to display the cancel button at the bottom
cancel-btn.description_zh: 是否显示底部的取消按钮

border-radius.description: The fillet values on the left and right sides of the pop-up section in rpx
border-radius.description_zh: 弹出部分顶部左右的圆角值，单位rpx

mask-close-able.description: Click to see if the mask can be turned off
mask-close-able.description_zh: 点击遮罩是否可以关闭

safe-area-inset-bottom.description: Whether to enable the bottom safe zone adaptation
safe-area-inset-bottom.description_zh: 是否开启底部安全区适配

events.name: click
events.description: Triggered when an ActionSheet list item is clicked
events.params: index: 点击了第几个，从0开始

events.name: close
events.description: Triggered when the cancel button is clicked
